sentence.text: A trader knowledgeable of such developments can take appropriate action .
She was a tough girl with an abrasive manner , and seemed very knowledgeable about the seamy side of life .

Herbert did not actually perform , but he produced shows ( John specifically mentioned revues ) and was quite knowledgeable about the theatre .
Over the last two decades people have become increasingly adventurous , less prejudiced and more knowledgeable about travel .
The old man was knowledgeable about music .
Even if I had been sufficiently knowledgeable about the NHS funding system to counter his arguments , I still would n't have felt up to political sparring .

In 1606 , Nicholas Bownde commented that many people were still more knowledgeable about Robin Hood than the Bible .

Consequently , over the years , I have become knowledgeable about many of the world 's remote places .
When setting up a community leg ulcer clinic , nurses need to be knowledgeable about many aspects of care ( Fig 1 ) .

If the adventurers are not very knowledgeable about Constant Drachenfels , this is a novel way of feeding them some more information .
He looked back at Theda and exchanged a knowledgeable glance with his friend Tiverton .
